        # CSS 规范

        # 通用

        1. View 目录下的业务page才用 css-module
        2. 通用 common ,系统级别样式采用less

        # css-module

        vue.config.js 配置

        
css: {
    requireModuleExtension: true,
    loaderOptions: {
        css: {
            modules: {
            localIdentName: '[name]_[hash:base64:8]'},
            localsConvention: 'camelCaseOnly'
        }
    }
}

        使用

        <template>
  <div :class="hello.container"></div>
</template>
<script lang="ts">
import { Component, Prop, Vue } from 'vue-property-decorator'

@Component({})
export default class HelloWorld extends Vue {}
</script>

<style module>
.container {
  margin: 10px;
}
</style>

        解析结果

        # less

        1 styles目录下创建

          |styles
  |--- transition.less
  |--- common.less
  |--- index.less
